tagline: an end-to-end pipeline for ingesting, processing, and analyzing diffusion MRI data
body:
This project contains several tools to play with fiber data in
MRI Studio format [ http://www.mristudio.org/ ].

The mrcap subdirectory contains the source code that generates
graphs from dMRI streamlines.  It produces two varieties of output:
  * smallgraphs: these use brain atlas regions of interest (70) to make 70z70 matrixes
  * biggraphs: these create connectivities among greymatter voxels.

The cmapper directory contains simple tools to manipulate 
connectome mapper outputs.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Mr-Cap: Magnetic Resonance Connectome Automated Pipeline
